How to install the spell checker for Unified Southern Quechua


 # download the spell checker from ...
 # get foma:
  * either the newest version from here:
     [http://code.google.com/p/foma/downloads/list]
  * or per svn checkout:
{{{
$ svn co http://foma.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/foma/ foma
}}}
 # copy fmed.c and the Makefile in /foma_files to the foma sources and compile foma:
{{{
$ cd path-to-your-foma-sources
$ cp foma_files/* .
$ make
$ make install
}}}
 # compile the finite state transducers (compiling the spanish transducers will take a while):
{{{
$ cd path-to-spellChecker/analyzer
$ foma -f analyzeUnificado.foma 
$ foma -f spellcheckUnificado.foma 
$ cd ../normalizer
$ foma -f normalizerSpellcheck.foma 
$ foma -f normalizer-relaxSpellcheck.foma
$ foma -f spanishSpellcheck.foma 
$ foma -f spanish-relaxSpellcheck.foma 
}}}
 # adapt the paths in spellcheck.sh
